resources.string: Soillseachadh am bòrd (an gluasachd mu dheireadh agus caisg)
Ceann-uidhe nam pìosan (gluasachdan dligheach agus ro-ghluasachdan)
Liosta na gluasachdan fhad \'s a tha thu a\' cluich

string.name: whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
string.comment:
whenTimeRemainingLessThanTenSeconds
The < symbol is not required (you can write it as a word), just do NOT use < in its place.
Technical information: < is a reserved character in HTML, which is why it cannot be used.

resources.string: Nuair a bhios < 10 diogan a thìde air fhàgail
Seirm nuair a tha an ùine gu bhith falbh orm
Nuair a bhios < 30 diog a thìde air fhàgail
Chaidh na roghainnean agad a shàbhaladh.
